channel.title: How do i create a welcome screen for my game?
channel.description:
How do I create a welcome screen for my game when the players login? do i have to go to a ceirtain file?
I want it to say "Welcome to Libun" "Visit ::rules so you won't get banned" "One Tokkul now equals 1 billion gp in Libun!!!"
if you can help will really appreciate it!!!

item.title: How do i create a welcome screen for my game?

item.title: How do i create a welcome screen for my game?

item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

Make a splash screen.
read tuts for instructions on doing this.

Read full topic
